title: Lalpa i thu hi a hlu ber
lyrics:
Lalpa i thu hi a hlu ber,
Khawvel sum zawng zawng aiin,
Lalpa, i thu hi a mawi ber,
Khawvel ropuina aiin,
Khuai aiin a thlum si,
Ka thinlung a tilawm thin.

Thlaler ram ro kal tlang turin,
I thu hian min hruai zel ang;
Hei hi chhumding eng chu a ni,
Israel faten an zui kha;
Keini m in hruai turin
A eng a la chuai chuang lo.

Khawvel tuifinriat zauvah hian,
Hlauthawnga ka len laiin;
Hmar arsi angin i thu hian,
Kan van kawng min hriattir se;
Tin, kan zui hlen ang che,
Chatuana bo tawh lovin.

Thlemna tuifawn, thlemna ral lian,
Khawvel nen min do mah se;
Lalpa, min thuam la, i thu hian,
Thlarau ngunhnam a ni si;
Kan hlau lo'ng, Setana,
Nangma chakna hmachhuanin.
